remarks: The sum of two group sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumadd as of 5-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumaddOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumaddOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumaddOLD.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumaddOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumaddOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumaddOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumaddOLD.h $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) $.
gsumaddOLD.fn $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumaddOLD.hn $e |- ( ph -> ( `' H " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumaddOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
